arts.ttl: Real Madrid vs Espanyol Preview: Start Time, Team News, How To Watch, Live Stream, & Odds
arts.sum: The two meetings last season were both won by the home team, Espanyol winning 1-0 and Real Madrid winning 4-1, having conceded first. Real Madrid Team News vs Espanyol

arts.ttl: All 10 LaLiga weekend games predictions - Week 6
arts.sum: Tom Hill previews this weekend's fixtures in LaLiga with games taking place across Friday, Saturday and Sunday.

arts.ttl: Did Espanyol's Captain Throw Shade at Real Madrid Players Regarding Penalties?
arts.sum: The club captain, Javi Puado, was asked about the current season and their upcoming game against Real Madrid after a training session. In a press conference after a training session (h/t Marca ), Javi Puado spoke about Real Madrid, the team they face in La Liga next.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid midfield duo could make their first appearance of the season vs Espanyol
arts.sum: Real Madrid welcomed Jude Bellingham and Eduardo Camavinga back into the squad for the first time this season when they faced Olympique de Marseille. Indeed, the midfield duo received their medical discharge earlier this week and were named in the squad for the game on Tuesday.
